name: Erotica Robotica
description:
Erotica Robotica is a Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes style game where multiple players must work together to sexually pleasure a robot, SAMM-69. As Your Date with SAMM-69 starts to shift into the bedroom you are struck by the realization that you have no clue how to properly give SAMM-69 the night of their life. Your only option is call up your friends and have them read off the manual to you to help you solve the complicated puzzle of pleasure.

This game was developed by a team of four, Bria Smith, Olivia Mignone, Noah Salaway & Erik Miller; Team BONE. I am Erik Miller and I was one of the main programmers of the game and designers of the main puzzles that make up SAMM-69's pleasure sequence. I hope you enjoy the game and that SAMM enjoys you. Please feel free to check out the other designers and developers. 

Olivia Mignone https://livicole.itch.io/
Noah Salaway https://nsalaway.itch.io/

Manual https://www.dropbox.com/s/zza1jobjq0i86kb/EroticaRoboticaManual.pdf?dl=0
